ingredients.ingredient: 1 teaspoon miso paste, or to taste
1 teaspoon oyster sauce, or to taste

cookingTips: Heat wok until smoking before adding oil to ensure proper searing and high heat cooking
Chop bok choy separating white stems from greens; add stems first for even cooking
Keep vegetables moving in wok to prevent sticking and ensure even, quick cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This Asian stir-fry celebrates umami from soy, mushrooms, and miso while keeping vegetables crisp. How can you achieve high-heat cooking without overcooking the delicate bok choy?
